about_the_game:
Slice, Slash, Dragon Blast, all hostiles and seal time altering zones!
Your mission: Prevent Draith's (the bad guy's) army from altering time and monopolizing Earth's resources...

Battle your way through a Cast of colorful characters with unique abilities. Take a stance against the NinjAnts, while dodging deadly robots. Evade guitar playing SkullE's and block staff attacks from "MonkFU" Monkeys! Defeat enemies in various locations and collect power-ups to enhance your abilities! Search for Chibi-Dragon Eggs to obtain a loyal ride or die in battle! Go it alone, or grab 3 other homies for Co-op!

• Beat em up
• Capture Flag (type mechanic)
• Power ups : Defense, Speed, Attack, Fire Damage, Ice Damage, etc...
• Weapon Upgrade
• Obtain a Dragon... some dragons have minions...

*More features and details will be revealed in future announcements!
detailed_description:
Slice, Slash, Dragon Blast, all hostiles and seal time altering zones!
Your mission: Prevent Draith's (the bad guy's) army from altering time and monopolizing Earth's resources...

Battle your way through a Cast of colorful characters with unique abilities. Take a stance against the NinjAnts, while dodging deadly robots. Evade guitar playing SkullE's and block staff attacks from "MonkFU" Monkeys! Defeat enemies in various locations and collect power-ups to enhance your abilities! Search for Chibi-Dragon Eggs to obtain a loyal ride or die in battle! Go it alone, or grab 3 other homies for Co-op!

• Beat em up
• Capture Flag (type mechanic)
• Power ups : Defense, Speed, Attack, Fire Damage, Ice Damage, etc...
• Weapon Upgrade
• Obtain a Dragon... some dragons have minions...

*More features and details will be revealed in future announcements!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 or newer
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Newer
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or above
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Jungle CATZ

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core or similar
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics: Intel (R) Hd Graphics 520, 2 GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
